ygData.subject: Information plz.
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone on this list have practical information concerning a way to do Nagafen, PoH, PoF, and Vox?  We have been the first groups on Quellious to break
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone on this list have practical information concerning a way to do
Nagafen, PoH, PoF, and Vox? We have been the first groups on Quellious to
break into PoH and PoF. Unfortunately, both have been marginally
successful. PoH isnt so difficult when you look at how ugly PoF is. Also,
we are planning on Raiding Lord Nagafen this weekend, and would really love
to have some information from those who have done it before on some of the
best tactics on how to accomplish this.

If anyone has some tactics they could pass along on all of these raids, I
would be most grateful.

Daks
